Doort Yeesey roo, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra, riu ec y yiennaghtyn reesht, tra nee mac y dooinney soie er stoylree‐oil e ghloyr, dy jean shiuish myrgeddyn t’er neyrt orryms, soie er daa stoyl ree‐oil yeig, briwnys daa heeloghe yeig Israel.
As yiow dy chooilley annane te’r hregeil thiyn, ny braaraghyn, ny shaaraghyn, ny ayr, ny moir, ny ben, ny cloan, ny talloo, er graigh mennyms, kead filley, as eiraght ayns y vea veayn.
Agh bee ymmodee jeusyn ta hoshiaght, er jerrey, as jeusyn ta er jerrey, hoshiaght.
SON ta reeriaght niau casley rish dooinney va ny ar‐thie, hie magh dy moghey, dy ailley labreeyn son e gharey‐feeney.
As tra ve er chordail rish ny labreeyn son ping ’sy laa, hug e ad stiagh ayns e gharey‐feeney.
As hie e magh my geart y tress oor, as honnick e feallagh elley ny shassoo nyn daaue ayns ynnyd y vargee,
As doort e roo, Gow‐jee shiuish myrgeddyn stiagh ayns y gharey‐feeney, as verryms diu cree-erbee ta cairagh. As hie ad rumboo.
Reeshtagh hie e magh my geart y chey‐oo as yn nuyhoo oor, as ren e er yn aght keddyn.
As my‐geart yn yn oor jeig, hie e magh, as hooar e feallagh elley ny shassoo nyn daaue, as doort e roo, Cre’n fa ta shiu nyn shassoo ayns shoh fey laa nyn daaue?
Doort adsyn rish, Er yn oyr nagh vel dooinney erbee er vailley shin. Doort eshyn roo, Gow‐jee shiuish myrgeddyn stiagh ayns y gharey‐feeney, as yiow shiu cre‐erbee, ta cairah.
Myr shen tra va’n fastyr er jeet, doort chirn y gharey‐feeney rish y stioort echey, Eie er ny labreeyn, as cur daue nyn vail, goall toshiaght veih yn vooinjer stierree gys y chied eallagh.
As tra haink feallagh yn yn oor‐jeig, hooar ad dy chooilley ghooinney ping.
Agh tra haink y chied eallagh, heill ad dy voghe ad ny smoo, as hooar adsyn myrgeddyn dy chooilley ghooinney ping.
As tra vad er ghoal eh, loar ad dy jymmoosagh rish yn far‐thie,
Gra, Cha vel yn vooinjer stierre shoh er nobbragh agh yn oor, as t’ow er, nianoo ad corrym rooinyn, te’r nymmyrkey errey as chiass y laa.
Agh dreggyr eshyn fer jeu, gra, Heshey vie, cha vel mish janoo aggair dhyt: Nagh choard uss rhyms son ping?
Trog shen ny ta liat, as immee royd: m’aigney’s eh dy choyrt da’n fer stierree shoh; myr ta mee er chur dhyts.
Nagh vel eh lowal dou, dy yanoo cre saillym rish my chooid hene? Vel dty hooyls olk, er‐y‐fa dy vel mish mie?
Myr shen bee adsyn ta er‐jerrey hoshiaght, as adsyn ta hoshiaght er‐jerrey: son ta ymmodee er nyn eam, agh beggan er nyn reih.
¶ As myr va Yeesey goll seose gys Jerusalem, ghow e yn dda ostyl yeig dy liattee er y raad, as doort e roo,
Cur‐my‐ner ta shin goll seose gys Jerusalem, as bee mac y dooinney er ny vrah gys ny ard‐saggyrtyn, as gys ny scruderyn, as deyree ad e gy baase,
As livreyee ad e hucsyn jeh ny ashoonyn quaah, dy chraidey mish, as dy chustey as dy chrossey e: as er y tress laa nee e girree reesht.
¶ Eishtagh haink huggey moir cloan Zebedee, as e meck mâree, cur ooashley da, as shirrey aghin er.
As doort e ree, Cre bailt? Doort ish rish, Lhow da my ghaa vac dy hoie, yn derrey yeh er dty lau yesh, as y jeh elley er dty laue chiare ayns dty reeriaght.

Agh dreggyr Yeesey as doort e, Cha s’eu cre ta shiu dy yearree. Vel shiu able giu jeh’n cappan ta mish giu jeh, as v’er nyn mashtey lesh y bashtey ta mish bashtit lesh? Doort adsyn rish, Ta shin able.

As doort e roo, Ivee shiu dy jaroo jeh my chappan, as bee shiu er nyn maishtey lesh y bashtey ta mish bashtit lesh: agh dy hoie er my laue yesh as er my laue chiare, cha vel shen liams dy choyrt, agh ny lomarcan daue syn, er nyn son te kiaddit liorish my ayr.
As tra cheayl yn jeih shoh, va’d feer jymmoosagh rish y daa vraar.
Agh deie Yeesey orroo huggey, as doort e, Ta fys eu dy vel prinsyn ny ashoonyn quaagh gymmyrkey reill harrystoo, as ta ny deney moarey gymmyrkey torrity nyn mastey.
Agh cha bee eh myr shen nyn mastey eauish: agh quoi‐erbee eavish ballish ve moar, lig e ve ry hoi shirveish erriu.
As quoi‐erbee syrjey ballish y ve nyn mast eu, lig e ve yn chiarvaant eu.
Myr nagh daink yn mac dooinney dy ve shirveishit, agh dy hirveish, as dy chur e vioys ny liassaghey son ymmodee.
As tra va’d er nimeeght veih Jericho, deyr earrooyn moarrey dy leih er.
¶ As cur‐my‐ner, va daa ghooinney doal nyn soie rish liattee yn raad, as tra cheayl ad dy row Yeesey goll shiaghey, deie ad, gra, Jean myghin orrin, O Hiarn, vac Ghavid.
As va’n pobble cur oghsan daue, dy voddagh ad nyn jengey chummal: agh deie adsyn wheesh shen smoo, gra, Jean myghin orrin, O Hiarn, vac Ghavid.
As hass Yeesey, as deie e orroo, as doort e, Cre balliu mee dy yanoo er nyn son eu?
Doort adsyn rish, Hiarn, dy vod ny sooyllyn ain v’er nyn vosley.
Myr shen va chymmey ec Yeesey orroo, as venn e rish ny sooyllyn oc: as chelleeragh hoar ny sooyllyn oc nyn soilshey, as deyr ad er.
AS tra vad tayrn ergerrey da Jerusalem; as dy row ad erjeet gys Bethphage, gys cronck ny Olivyn, hug Yeesey jees jeusyn va kinjagh geyrt er, er chaghteraght,
As doort e roo, Imee‐jee gys y balleybeg ta shiu dy akin, as chelleeragh yiow shiu assyl kainlt as lhie mâree: feysh‐jee as cur‐jee lieu ad hyms.
As my loarys dooinney erbee veg riu, abbyr‐jee shiuish, Ta feme ec y Chiarn orroo, as chelleeragh liggee e yn raad daue.
Va ooilley shoh jeant, dy voddagh shen ve cooilleenit va loarit liorish y phadeyr, gra,
Insh‐jee da inneen Sion, Cur‐my‐ner, ta dty Ree cheet hood, dy imlee, as ny hoie er assyl, as er lhie sharragh assyl.
As hie adsyn rumboo, as ren ad, myr va Yeesey er n’oardaghey daue.
As hug ad lieu yn assyl as y lhie, as hug ad orroo nyn eadagh, as hug ad eshyn ny hoie
As ren earrooyn moarrey dy leih skeylley nyn gharmadyn er y raad; yiare feailagh elley banglanyn jeh ny biljyn, as skeyl ad ad, er y raad.
As deie yn pobble, hie roish, as adsyn haink ny yei, gra, Hosanna gys mac Ghavid, bannit ta eshyn ta cheet ayns ennym y Chiarn, Hosanna ayns yn yrjid.
As tra ve er jeet gys Jerusalem, va ooilley’n ard‐valley jymmoosagh, gra, Quoi e shoh?
Doort e pobble, Shoh Yeesey yn phadeyr, ta veih Nazareth ayns Galilee.

¶ As hie Yeesey stiagh ayns chiamble Yee, as deiyr e magh ooilley adsyn va creck as kionnaghey ayns y chiamble, as hilg e harrish ny buird ocsyn va caghlaa argid, as ny stuill ocsyn va creck calmanyn.
As doort e roo, Te scruit, Bee my hies enmyssit thie yn phadjer, agh ta shiuish er niannoo eh ny ooig dy vaarlee.
As haink ny doal as ny croobee huggey gys y chiamble, as ren e ad y leiy‐ys.
As tra honnick ny ard‐saggyrtyn as ny scruderyn ny reddyn yyndyssagh ve dy yianoo, as y chloan gemagh ayns y chiamble, as gra, Hosannah gys mac Ghavid, vad feer jymmoosagh,
As doort ad rish, Vel oo clashtyn cre ta’d shoh dy ghra? Doort Yeesey roo, Ta mee, nagh lhaigh shiuish rieau, magh ass beil ooikanyn as cloan er y cheeagh to’w er gheddyn moylley firrinagh?
As daag e ad, as hie e magh ass yn ardvalley gys Bethany, as ghow e aight ayns shen.
Nish ayns y voghrey, myr ve goll reesht gys yn ard‐valley, ve accryssagh.

As tra honnick e billey‐figgagh er y raad, haink e huggey, as cha dooar e nee erbee er, agh ynrycan dooillagyn, as doort e rish, Nar aase mess erbee orts veih shoh magh er son dy bragh. As chelleeragh ren y billey figgagh fioghey ersooyl.
As tra honnick yn vooinjer va sheer geyrt er shoh, ghow ad yyndyss, gra, Cre cha leah as tan billey figgagh er fioghey ersooyl?

Dreggyr Yeesey, as doort e roo, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, My vees credjue eu, as mannagh jean shiu dooteil, nee shiu cha nee ynrycan shoh, ta jeant rish y billey‐figgagh, agh my jir shiu rish y slieau shoh, Be er dy scughey, as er dy hilgey ayns y cheayn, bee eh er ny yianoo.
As dy chooilley nee cre‐erbee nee shiu y hirrey ayns padjer, my vees eh lesh credjue nee shiu y gheddyn eh.
¶ As tra ve er jeet stiagh ayns y chiamble, haink ny ard‐saggyrtyn as shanstyr yn pobble huggey, myr ve gynsaghey, gra, Cre’n phooar t’ayds dy yannoo ny reddyn shoh? as quoi hug yn phooar shoh dhyt?
As dreggyr Yeesey as doort e roo, Fênyms jiuish yn red, as my inshys shiu dou eh, inshyms myrgeddyn diuish, cre’n phooar t’aym dy yanoo ny reddyn shoh.
Bashtey Ean, cre woish ve? veih niau, ny veih deney? As loar ad nyn mast oc hene, gra, My jir mad veih niau; jir eshyn rooin, Cre’n fa eisht nagh chred shiu eh?
Agh my jir mad, Veih deney; ta aggle ain roish y pobble; son ta dy chooilley ghooinney goall Ean son phadeyr.
As dreggyr ad Yeesey, as doort ad, Cha vel shin able insh. As doort e roo, Cha‐moo inshyms diuish, cre’n phooar t’aym, dy yanoo ny reddyn shoh?
¶ Agh cre ta shiu dy smooinaghtyn? Va dooinney dy row, as daa vac echey, as haink e gys y chied vac as doort e, Vac, gow as obbree jiu ayns my gharey‐feeney.
Dreggyr eshyn, as doort e, cha jem: agh ny lurg shen ghow e arrys as hie e.
As haink e gys yn nah vac as loar e rish myrgeddyn. As dreggyr eshyn, as doort e, hem vainshter, as cha jagh e.
Quoi jeu shoh nyn neesht ren aigney e ayrey? Doort adsyn rish yn chied vac. Doort Yeesey roo, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, dy jed ny publicanee as ny streebaghyn stiagh ayns reeriaght yee, reu‐ish.

Son haink Ean hiuish ayns raad y chairys, as cha chred shiu eh: agh chred ny publicanee as ny streebaghyn e. As tra honnick shiuish shoh, cha ghow shiu arrys ny lurg shen, dy voddagh shiu e y chredjal.

¶ Easht‐jee rish coraa dorraghey elley: Va far‐thie dy row, ren garey‐feeney y hoiaghey, as ren e cley y mish, as chleigh e press‐feeney ayn, as hrog e toor, as hoie e e rish fir‐hie, as hie e gys cheer foddey.
As tra va earish ny mess tayrn er‐gerrey, hug e e ir‐mooinjery gys ny fir‐hie, dy voddagh ad geddyn jeh’n mess echey.
As ghow ny fir‐hie e ir‐mooinjery, as woail ad fer, as var ad fer elley, as chlagh ad fer elley.
Reeshtagh hug e magh shiarvaantyn elley ny sliee ny’n chied eallagh; as ghell ad roosyn er yn aght keddyn.
Agh er jerrey ooilley hug e huc e vac, gra, Bee ad arrymagh da my vac.
Agh tra honnick ny fir‐hie yn mac, doort ad nyn mast oc hene, shoh’n Eirey, tar‐jee, lig dooin e varroo, as bee’n eiraght echey lien hene.
As ghow ad e, as hilg ad e magh ass y gharey‐feeney, as var ad e.
Tra hig er‐y‐fa shen chiarn y gharey‐feeney, Cre nee e rish ny fir‐hie shen?
Doort adsyn rish, stroie‐ee e fegooish myghin ny drogh gheney shen, as soie‐ee e yn garey feeney rish fir‐hie elley, livrey‐ys ny messyn da, ayns nyn imbaghyn.

Doort Yeesey roo, Nagh lhaih shiuish rieau ayns goo yee, Yn chlagh ren adsyn va troggal y thie, y vee‐lowal, ta’n chlagh cheddyn er‐jeet dy ve yn ard chlagh chorneilagh: shoh janoo yn chiarn, as te yyndyssagh ayns ny sooyllyn ainyn?
Shen‐y‐fa ta mish gra riu, Dy bee reeriaght yee er ny ghoall veuish, as er ny choyrt da ashoon, ymmyrkys magh yn mess echey.
As quoi‐erbee huittys er y chlagh shen, bee e er ny vroo: agh quoi‐erbee huittys y chlagh shen er, nee ee cha meen as joan jeh.
As tra va ny ard‐saggyrtyn as ny Phariseyn erreish ny coraaghyn dorraghey echey y chlashtyn, dennee ad dy nee jeusyn ve loart.
Agh tra vad aignagh dy ghoall e, ghow ad aggle roish y pobble, er‐yn‐oyr dy row ad jeaghyn er, dy ve ny adeyr.
AS dreggyr Yeesey as loar e roo reesht liorish coraaghyn dorraghey, gra;
Ta reeriaght niau er ny holaghey gys ree dy row ren bannish son e vac,
As hug e magh e harvaantyn dy emagh orroosyn va cuirt gys y vannish as cha row ad aignagh dy heet.

Reeshtagh hug e magh shiarvaantyn elley, gra, Abbyr‐jee roosyn ta cuirt, Cur‐my‐ner ta mee er n’aarlaghey my yinnair: ta my ghew as my veiyn beiht marroo, as dy chooilley nee aarloo; tar‐jee gys y vannish.
Agh hoie adsyn beg jeh, as hie ad rumboo, fer gys e valley as fer elley gys y dellal echey:
As ghow yn chooid elley ny shiarvaantyn echey as ghell ad dy roonagh roo, as var ad ad.
Agh tra cheayl y Ree jeh, ve jymmoosagh: as hug e magh e heshaghtyn‐caggee, as stroie e ny dunveryn shen, as losht e yn ard‐valley oc.
Eishtagh doort e rish e harvaantyn, Ta’n vannish aarloo, agh y vooinjer va cuirt, cha row ad feeu.
Gow‐jee magh er‐y‐fa shen gys ny raadjin moarey, as chooilleen as yiow shin, cuir‐jee gys y vannish.
As hie ny shiarvaantyn shen magh gys ny raadjin moarey, as ren ad chooilleen as haink nyn raad y haglym cooidjagh, chammah sie as mie, as va thie ny banshey er ny lieeney lesh goaldee.
¶ As tra haink y Ree stiagh dy akin ny goaldee, honnick e dooinney ayns shen nagh row garmad‐poost er.
As doort e rish, Charrey, kys haink uss stiagh ayns shoh, fegooish garmad‐poost? as cha row fockle echey dy ghra.
Eisht doort y Ree rish ny shiarvaantyn, Kiangle‐jee e laue as cass, as gow‐jee e ersooyl, as tilg‐jee e ayns y dorraghys sodjey mooie: ayns shen vees keaney as snaggeraght feeacklyn.
Son ta ymmodee er nyn eam, agh beggan er nyn reih.
¶ Eishtagh hie ny Phariseyn, as hug ad nyn goyrle dy cheiley, kys oddagh e y hayrn ayns rybbey, liorish e ocklyn.

As hug ad magh huggey shiartance jeusyn vad hene er nynsaghey, marish ny Herodianee, gra, Vainshter, ta fys ain dy vel oo firrinagh, as dy vel oo gynsaghey raad yee ayns firrinys, chamoo t’ow ayns imnea roish dooinney erbee: son cha vel oo soiaghey jeh persoon deney.
Insh dooin er‐y‐fa shen cre t’on dy smooinaght, Vel eh lowal keesh y choyrt da Cesar mannagh vel?
Agh dennee Yeesey yn olkys oc, as doort e, Cre’n fa ta shiu dy my violaghey, chrauee foalsey?
Jeagh‐jee dow argid y cheesh, as hug ad lieu huggey ping.
As doort e roo, Quoi gys ta’n jalloo as y scrieu shoh bennalt?
Doort adsyn rish, gys Cesar. Eishtagh doort e roo, Eek‐jee er‐y‐fa shen da Cesar, ny reddyn ta lesh Cesar: as da Jee ny reddyn ta lesh Jee.
Tra cheayl ad shoh, ghow ad yyndyss, as daag ad e, as hie ad rumboo.
¶ Yn laa keddyn haink huggey ny Sadduceyn, ta gra nagh vel irree seose reesht dy ve ayn, as dênee ad jeh,
Gra, Vainshter, ta Moses er ghra, my ta dooinney geddyn baase, fegooish cloan, dy vel e vraar dy phoosey’n ven echey, as dy hroggal seose sluight gys e vraar.
Nish boyn dooinyn shiaght braaraghyn, as hooar y chied vraar, tra ve er phoosey ben, baase, fegooish cloan, as daag e e ven gys yn nah vraar.
As hooar yn nah vraar myrgeddyn baase as y tress gys y chiaghtoo.
As er jerrey ooilley hooar y ven baase myrgeddyn.
Shen‐y‐fa ec yn irree reesht, quoi jeh’n chiaght vees ee echey son ben, son vie son ben daue ooilley.
Dreggyr Yeesey as doort e roo, Ta shiu fo marranys, as cha vel toiggal eu jeh goo, ny jeh pooar Yee.
Son ec yn irree reesht, cha vel ad poosey ny er nyn goyrt ayns poosey; agh ta’d myr ainlyn Yee t’ayns niau.
Agh my‐chione irree seose reesht ny merriu, nagh vel shiu er lhaih shen va loart riu liorish Jee, gra,
Mish Jee Abraham, as Jee Isaac, as Jee Yacob? cha vel Jee ny Yee jeh ny merriu, agh jeh ny bio.
As tra cheayl yn pobble shoh, ghow ad yyndyss jeh’n ynsaghey echey.
¶ Agh tra va ny Phariseyn er chlashtyn, dy row e er chur er ny Sadduceyn ve nyn dost, vad er nyn jagglym cooidjagh.
As denee fer jeu va ny er‐ynsee jeh’n leih question jeh, er chee y violaghey e, gra,
Vainshter, cre yn ard anney ayns y leih?
Doort Yeesey rish, Ver oo graih d’an chiarn dty Yee, lesh ooilley dty chree, as lesh ooilley dt’annym, as lesh ooilley dt’aigney.
Shoh yn chied as yn ard anney.
As ta’n nah anney casley rish, Ver oo graih da dty naboo, myr dhyt hene.
Yn daa anney shoh bun y leih as ny phaderyn.
¶ Choud as va ny Phariseyn er nyn jaglym cooidjagh, dênee Yeesey jeu,
Gra, Cre ta shiu dy smooinaght jeh Creest? quoi da mac e? doort adsyn rish, Mac Ghavid.
Doort eshyn roo, kys eishtagh dy vel David liorish y spyrryd genmyss e ny Hiarn, gra,
Doort y Chiarn rish my Hiarn’s, soie uss er my laue yesh, derrey verrym dty noidjyn son stoyll fo dty chassyn.
My ta David eisht genmyss e ny Hiarn, kys te yn mac echey?
As cha row dooinney erbee able fockle dy ansoor y chur da, cha‐moo by loys da dooinney erbee (veih’n laa shen magh) question erbee sodjey y enaght jeh.
EIshtagh loar Yeesey rish y pobble, as roosyn va sheer geyrt er,
Gra, ta ny scruderyn as ny Phariseyn nyn soie ayns stoyl Voses.
Ooilley er‐y‐fa shen cre‐erbee nee ad y oardaghey div dy realley, freil‐jee as jean‐jee eh; agh ny jean‐jee lurg ny obbraghyn oc: son ta’d gra, as cha vel ad janoo.
Son ta’d kiangley erraghyn tromey as doilley dy ve er nyn ymmyrkey, as dyn goyrt ad er geayltyn deney, agh cha gleashee adsyn ad hene ad lesh annane jeh ny meir oc.
Agh ooilley nyn obbraghyn ta’d dy yanoo, dy ve er nyn vakin liorish deney: ta’d janoo liane ny
As shynney lieu ny ard ynnydyn‐soie y ve oc ec cuirraghyn, as ny ard stuill ayns ny kialteenyn,
As sleih dy vannaghey daue ayns ny margaghyn, as dy ve enmyssit liorish deney Rabbi, Rabbi.
Agh ny bee jee shiuish enmyssit Rabbi: son ta yn vainshter eu, ta shen dy ghra Creest as ta shiuish ooilley nyn mraaraghyn.
As ny enmyss‐jee dooinney erbee yn ayr eu er y talloo, son ta yn er ny ayr diu, ta ayns niau.
Cha‐moo bee‐jee enmyssit mainshteryn, son ta yn er ny vainshter erriu, ta shen dy ghra Creest.
Agh y fer syrjeh nyn mast eu, bee e diu ny harvaant.
As quoi‐erbee nee e hene y hoiaghey seose, bee e er ny injillaghey, as eshyn nee e hene y injillaghey, bee e er ny hoiaghey seose.

¶ Agh smerg diuish scruderyn as Phariseyn, chrauee‐foalsey; son ta shiu jeih seose reeriaght niau noi deney: son cha vel shiu goll stiagh shiu hene, as ta shiu dyn liettal adsyn ta aarloo dy gholl stiagh.
Smerg diu scruderyn as Phariseyn, chrauee‐foalsey; son ta shiu cur mow thiyn mrane treoghe, as liggey erriu dy bee shiu foddey ec padjer; shen‐y‐fa ta kerraghey strimmey nyn gouyr.

Smerg diu scruderyn as Phariseyn, chrauee‐foalsey; son ta shiu goll migeart keayn as talloo, dy hayrn yn yoaree gys y chredjue, as tra te er jyndaa hiu, ta shiu dy yanoo e, ny lianoo dy nivrin gha wheeish as shiu hene.
Smerg diu leedeilee doall, ta gra, quoi‐erbee loo‐ys liorish y chiamble, nagh vel eh veg: agh quoi‐erbee loo‐ys liorish aer y chiamble, dy negin da coontey choyrt.
Mee‐cheealagh as doall, son quoi smoo ta dy ve soit jeh, yn aer, ny’n chiamble ta casherickey yn aer?
As quoi‐erbee looys liorish yn altar, nagh vel eh veg: agh quoi‐erbee loo‐ys liorish y gioot te’r yn altar, dy vel er coontey choyrt.
Mee‐cheealagh as doall: son quoi smoo ta dy ve soit jeh yn gioot, ny’n altar ta casherickey yn gioot?
Quoi‐erbee er‐y‐fa shen looys liorish yn altar te loo liorish yn altar hene, as liorish dy chooilley nee ta er.
As quoi‐erbee looys liorish y chiamble, te loo liorish y chiamble as liorishyn ta vaghey ayn.
As eshyn nee loo liorish niau, te loo liorish stoyl‐ree‐oil Yee, as liorishyn ta ny hoie er.

Smerg diu scruderyn as Phariseyn chrauee‐foalsey; son ta shiu geeck jaghee jeh myndey, anise as cumin, as cha vel shiu er chooilleeney currymyn symmyrtsee jeh’n leih, cairys, myghin, as firrinys: ad shoh lishagh shiu v’er nianoo, fegooish y chooid elley y agail gyn janoo.
Leedeilee doall, ta carwhillag snemmey erriu, agh sluggee shiu camel.
Smerg diu scruderyn as Phariseyn chrauee‐foalsey; son ta shiu glenney yn cappan as y claare er cheu‐mooie, agh cheu‐stie ta’d laane dy hran laase as dy niau‐heeltys.
Pharisee doall, glen hoshiaght shen ny ta cheu‐stie jeh’n chappan as jeh’n chlaare, dy vod yn cheu‐mooie oc ve glen myrgeddyn.

Smerg diu scruderyn as Phariseyn, chrauee‐foalsey; son ta shiu goll rish oaiaghyn te’r nyn niallaghey, ta dy jarroo jeaghyn aalin er cheumooie, agh cheu‐stie ta’d laane dy chrauyn ny merriu, as jeh dy chooilley vroid.
Shen myr ta shiuish neesht er cheumooie cairagh ayns shilley deney, agh cheu‐stie ta shiu laane dy chraueeaght oalsey as dy vee‐chairys.
Smerg diu scruderyn as Phariseyn, chrauee‐foalsey; er‐y‐fa dy vel shiu troggal ooiaghyn ny phaderyn, as soiaghey magh liaghtyn ny deney cairagh,
As gra, Dy beagh shinyn er ve, ayns laghyn nyn ayraghyn, cha beagh shin er ve nyn baarteasyn maroosyn ayns fuill ny phaderyn.
Shen‐y‐fa ta shiu nyn venishyn diu hene, dy nee yn chloan ocsyn shiu ren ny phaderyn y varroo.
Leen‐jee seose eishtagh towse nyn ayraghyn.
Shiuish ard‐nieughyn, sheeloghe dy ard‐nieughyn, kys oddys shiu kerraghey nivrin y scapail?

¶ Shen‐y‐fa cur‐my‐ner ta mish coyrt hiu phaderyn, as deney creeney, as screeuderyn; as part jeu nee shiu y varroo as y chrossey, as part jeu nee shiu y chustey ayns ny kialteenyn eu as tranlaase y yanoo orroo veih ardvalley gys ardvalley.
Dy vod ooilley yn uill chairagh hie er deartey er y talloo tuittym erriu, veih fuill Abel cairagh, gys fuill Zacharias, mac Barachias, e ren shiu y varroo eddyr y chiamble as yn altar.
Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, dy jig dy chooilley nee jeu shoh er y cheeloghe shoh.

Yerusalem, Yerusalem, ta marroo ny phaderyn, as dyn glaghey adsyn te’r nyn goyrt er chaghteraght hood, cre cha mennich as va mish booiaght v’er hagglyrn dty chloan cooidjagh, ’naght myr ta kiark goall stiagh e hein fo my skainyn, as cha nee yn aigney eu ve?
Cur‐my‐ner ta’n thie eu faagit diu tregit.
Son ta mee gra riu, nagh vaik shiu mish ny yei shoh, derrey jir shiu, Bannit ta eshyn ta cheet ayns ennym y Chiarn.
AS hie Yeesey magh as jimmee e veih’n chiamble; as haink y vooinjer va sheer geyrt er huggey, dy chur shilley da jeh stooamit y chiamble.
As doort Yeesey roo, Nagh vaik shiu ooilley ny reddyn shoh? Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, nagh bee faagit yn chlagh er chlagh elley, nagh bee er ny hilgey sheese.
¶ As myr ve ny hoie er cronck ny olivyn, haink y vooinjer va sheer geyrt er huggey er lieh, gra, Insh dooin cooin vees ny reddyn shoh? as cre’n cowrey vees jeh’n cheet ayd as jeh jerrey’n teihll?
As dreggyr Yeesey as doort e roo, Cur jee twoai nagh moll dooinney erbee shiu.
Son hig ymmodee ayns m’ennyms gra, Mish Creest, as nee ad ymmodee y volley.
As clinnee shiu jeh caggaghyn, as jeh imraaghyn dy chaggaghyn: jeagh nagh bee shiu seaghnit: son shegin da dy chooilley nee jeu shoh cheet gys kione, agh cha bee yn jerrey foast.
Son irree ashoon noi ashoon as reeriaght noi reeriaght, as bee gennaghyn as crampyn as craaghyn tallooin ayns ymmodee ynnydyn.
Bee ooilley shoh toshiaght trimshey.
Eisht livrey‐ee ad shiu seose dy ve seaghnit, as marree ad shiu: as bee feogh ec dy chooilley ashoon erriu, er coontey yn ennym ayms.
As eishtagh gowee ymmodee oyr dy huittym ayns peccah, as brah‐ee ad as ver ad feoh yn derrey yeh da’n jeh elley.
As nee ymmodee phaderyn foalsey girres seose, as ymmodee y volley.
As er yn oyr dy jean olkys bishaghey, nee graih ymmodee seyraghey.
Agh bee, eshyn nee tannaghtyn firrinagh gys y jerrey, er ny hauail.
As bee shushtal yn reeriaght er ny phreacheil ayns ooilley’n seihl, son fenish da dy chooilley ashoon, as eisht nee yn jerrey cheet.
Tra hee shiu er‐y‐fa shen eajee id yn traartys ta loarit jeh liorish Daniel yn phadeyr, ny hassoo ayns yn ynnyd casherick (eshyn ta lhaih, lig da tastey ghoall)
Eishtagh lig dauesyn t’ayns Judea roih gys ny sleityn;
Eshyn te’r mullagh y thie, ny lig da cheet neose, dy ghoall nee erbee ass e hie.
As ny lig dasyn t’ayns y vagher chyndaa back, dy chur lesh e eddagh.
As smerg dauesyn ta torragh, as dauesyn ta cur keagh ayns ny laghyn shen.
Agh guee‐jee shiuish nagh bee yn roih eu er chea ayns y yeurey, ny er y doonaght.
Son bee seaghyn moar ec y tra shen, leid as nagh row er dy hoshiaght y teihll gys yn earish shen, as leid as nagh bee arragh dy bragh.
As mannagh beagh ny laghyn shen dy leah ec kione, cha beagh feill erbee er ny hauail, agh er gruih yn chloan reiht, bee ny laghyn shen dy leah ec kione.
Eisht my jir dooinney erbee riu, Cur‐my-ner ta Creest ayns shoh, ny ayns shid; ny creid‐jee eh.
Son nee Creestyn foalsey as phaderyn foalsey girree, as cowraghyn moarey as yyndyssyn y oilshaghey, ayns wheesh as dy mollagh ad (dy beagh eh possible) yn eer chloan reiht.
Cur‐my‐ner ta mish er ninsh diu rolaue.
Shen‐y‐fa my jir ad riu, Te ayns yn aasagh, ny gow‐jee magh: Cur‐my‐ner, te ayns ny shamyryn follit, ny creid‐jee eh.
Son myr ta’n tendeil cheet ass y shar, as cur soilshey choud as gys y sheear myr shen myrgeddyn vees cheet yn mac dooinney.
Son raad erbee dy bee yn corp, ayns shen vees ny urlaghyn er nyn jaglym.
¶ Chelleeragh lurg seaghyn ny laghyn shen, aasee yn ghrian dorraghey, as cha der yn aist e soilshey, as tuittee rollagyn yn aer, as bee pooaraghyn yn aer er nyn graa.

As eishtagh bee cowrey jeh’n Mac dooinney er ny akin ayns yn aer: as ec y tra shen nee ooilley sheeloghyn y tallooin dobberan, as hee ad yn Mac dooinney cheet ayns bodjallyn yn aer, lesh pooar as gloyr woar.
As ver e magh e ainlyn lesh feiyr moircayrn, as nee ad e chloan reiht y haglym cooidjagh veih ny kiare geayghyn, veih yn derrey chione jeh’n aer gys y chione elley.
Ynsee‐jee eisht coraa‐dorraghey jeh’n billey figgagh: tra ta’n banglane echey foast oor, as cur magh duillagyn, ta fys eu dy vel y sourey ergerrey.
Myr shen myrgeddyn shiuish, tra hee shiu ooilley ny reddyn shoh, toigjee dy vel e ergerrey, dy jarroo ec ny dorryssyn.
Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, roish my vow yn cheeloghe shoh baase, dy bee dy chooilley nee jeu shoh cooilleenit.
Nee niau as talloo cherraghtyn, agh my ghoans cha jean cherraghtyn.
¶ Agh er y laa as yn oor shen, cha vel fys ec dooinney erbee, ny ec ainlyn niau, agh ec my Ayr ny lomarcan.
Agh myr va laghyn Noe, myr shen myrgeddyn vees cheet yn Mac dooinney.
Son myr ayns ny laghyn va roish y thooilley, va’d gee as giv, poosey as coyrt ayns poosey, derrey yn laa hie Noe stiagh ayns yn arg,
As cha dug ad tastey, derrey haink y thooilley as ghow eh ad ooilley ersooyl, myr shen myrgeddyn vees cheet yn Mac dooinney.
Shen y tra vees jees ayns y vagher, bee yn derrey yeh goit, as y jeh elley fagit.
Bee daa ven blieh ec y wyllyn, yn derrey yeh goit as y jeh elley fagit.
¶ Bee‐jee er nyn dwoai er‐y‐fa shen, son cha vel fys eu er oor cheet nyn Iiarn.
Agh shoh toig‐jee, dy beagh fys er ve ec maishter y thie cre’n oor veagh y maarlagh er jeet, veagh e er watchal, as cha beagh e er liggey da e hie y vrishey stiagh.
Shen‐y‐fa bee‐jee shiuish myrgeddyn aarloo, son ec leid yn oor as nagh vel shiu smooinaght er hig yn Mac dooinney.
Quoi eisht yn Chiarvaant firrinagh as creeney, ta e Hiarn er nianoo ny er‐reil er e hie, dy chur daue nyn meaghey ayns earish cooie?
Bannit ta’n chiarvaant shen yiow e Hiarn janoo myr shen ec y cheet echey.
Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu dy livrey e dys y churrym echey ooilley e chooid.
Agh my jir y drogh harvaant shen ayns e chree, Ta my Hiarn liggey shiaghey yn cheet echey,
As toshiaght y yanoo dy woalley e heshaghyn‐harvaant, as dy ee as dy iv marish y vooinjer veshtal:
Hig Chiarn y chiarvaant shen ec laa nagh bee e jeaghyn er y hon, as ayns oor nagh bee e twoaiagh jeh,
As giaree e e veih my chielley, as pointee e e chronney marish ny crauee‐foalsey: ayns shen vees keaney as snaggeraght feeacklyn.
EIsht bee reeriaght niau er ny holaghey gys jeih moidynyn, ghow ny lampyn oc, as hie magh quail y dooinney poost.
As va queg jeu creeney as queg ommijagh.
Hug adsyn va ommijagh lieu ny lampyn oc, agh cha dug ad lieu ooil maroo.
Agh hug y vooinjer chreeney lieu ooil ayns ny siyn oc marish nyn lampyn.
Choud as va’d feeau er y dooinney poost, huit ad ooilley er saveenagh as cadley.
As ec main‐uy va eam er ny choyrt, Cur-my‐ner ta’n dooinney‐poost cheet, gow‐jee magh ny whail.
Eisht dirree ooilley ny moidynyn shen, as hooar ad aarloo nyn lampyn.
As doort y vooinjer ommijagh roosyn va creeney, Cur‐jee dooinyn jeh’n ooil eauish, son ta ny lampyn ain goll ass.
Agh dreggyr y vooinjer chreeney, gra, Cha jean, er aggle nagh bee dy liooar ain dooin hene as diuish neesht, te ny share diu roih dys y vooinjer ta creck as kionnaghey er nyn son hene.
As choud as va’d goll dy chionnaghey; haink y dooinney‐poost, as hie yn vooinjer va aarloo stiagh marish gys y vannish, as va’n dorrys jeiht.
Ny lurg shen haink ny moidynyn elley, gra, Hiarn, Hiarn, fosle dooin.
Agh dreggyr eshyn as doort e, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, nagh voddym goall riu.
Bee‐jee er nyn dwoai er‐y‐fa shen, son cha vel fys eu er y laa ny’n oor nee yn Mac dooinney cheet.
¶ Son te marragh dooinney va goll er troailt gys cheer foddey deie er e harvaantyn as livrey daue e chooid:
As da fer jeu, hug e queg talentyn, da fer elley jees, as da fer elley annane, da dy chooilley ghooinney lurg roshtin e hushtey, as chelleeragh ghow e e yurnah.
Eishtagh hie yn fer v’er gheddyn ny queg talentyn, as ren e dellal lieu, as chosne e queg talentyn elley.
As myr shen eshyn ve’r gheddyn jees, chosne eshyn myrgeddyn jees elley.
Agh y fer ve’r gheddyn annane, hie e as chley e ayns y talloo, as dollee e argid e Hiarn.
Agh lurg foddey dy earish haink chiarn ny shiarvaantyn shen, as ren e coontey roo.
As haink eshyn ve’r gheddyn ny queg talentyn as hug e lesh queg talentyn elley, gra, Hiarn, livrey uss doos queg talentyn, cur‐my‐ner, ta mee er chosney queg talentyn elley mâroo.
Doort e Hiarn rish, smie t’ow er nianoo, harvaant vie as firrinagh, t’ow er ny ve firrinagh ayns y veggan, livreyms moarane gys dty churrym; gow stiagh gys boggey dty Hiarn.
Haink eshyn myrgeddyn v’er gheddyn yn daa halent, as doort e, Hiarn, livrey uss doos daa halent: cur‐my‐ner, ta mee er chosney daa halent elley mâroo.
Doort e Hiarn rish, smie t’ow er nianoo, harvaant vie as firrinagh, t’ow er ny ve firrinagh ayns y veggan, livreyms moarane gys dty churrym: gow stiagh gys boggey dty hiarn.
Agh y fer v’er gheddyn yn yn talent, haink e as doort e, Hiarn, Va fys ayms dy nee dooinney creoi oo; buinn raad nagh ren oo cuirr, as chaglym raad nagh ren oo skeylley:
As ghow mee aggle, as hie mee as dollee mee dty halent ayns y talloo, cur‐my‐ner, shen y raad ta dty chooid.
Dreggyr e hiarn, as doort e rish, Harvaant vee‐chairagh as niau‐harroogh, va fys ayds, dy row mish buinn, raad nagh ren mee cuirr, as chaglym raad nagh ren mee skeylley.
Lishagh oo er‐y‐fa‐shen ve’r chur my argid dauesyn ta janoo vondeish liorish argid y yeasaght, as eishtagh ec y cheet aym, oddin v’er gheddyn my chooid hene lesh bishaghey.
Gow‐jee er‐y‐fa‐shen yn talent veih, as cur‐jee eh dasyn ta jeih talentyn echey.
Son da dy chooilley annane ta echey, vees er ny choyrt; as bee towse smoo echey: agh veihsyn nagh vel echey, vees er ny ghoall ersooyl shen ny ta echey.
As tilg‐jee yn chiarvaant niau‐harroogh ayns y dorraghys sodjey mooie, ayns shen vees keaney as snaggeraght feeacklyn.
¶ Tra hig yn Mac dooinney ayns e ghloyr, as ooilley e ainlyn casherick marish, shen y tra heiys e er stoyl‐reeoil e ghloyr.
As kiongoyrt rish vees dy chooilley ashoon er nyn jaglym, as scarree e ad veih my chielley, myr ta bochilley cur scarrey eddyr e chirree as ny goair.
As soiee e ny kirree er e laue yesh, agh ny goair er e laue chiare.
Eisht jir y Ree roosyn er e laue yesh, Tar‐jee my chloan bannit jeh my Ayr, gow‐jee myr eiraght yn reeriaght ta kiarit er nyn son eu, er dy hoshiaght y teihll.
Son va mee accryssagh, as hug shiu beaghey dou: va mee paagh as hug shiu jough dou: Va mee my yoarree, as ghow shiu stiagh mee:
Rooisht as ren shiu my choamrey: va mee ching, as haink shiu dy my yeaghyn: va mee ayns pryssoon, as haink shiu hym.
Eishtagh nee yn chloan chairagh e y reggyrt, gra, Hiarn, cooin honnick shin oo accryssagh, as dy dug shinyn beaghey dhyt? ny paagh as dy dug shin jough dhyt?
Cooin honnick shin oo dty yoarree, as dy ghow shin stiagh oo? ny rooisht as dy ren shin dy choamrey?
Ny cooin honnick shin oo ching, ny ayns pryssoon, as dy daink shin dy dy yeaghyn?
As freggyr ee yn Ree, as jir e roo, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, ayns wheesh as dy vel shiu er nianoo eh, son y fer sloo jeu shoh my vraaraghyn, ta shiu er nianoo eh er my hons.
Eishtagh jir e roosyn myrgeddyn er y laue chiare, Immee‐jee voym chloan chursit gys yn aile dy bragh farraghtyn, ta kiarit son y drogh‐spyrryd as e ainlyn.
Son va mee accryssagh, as cha dug shiu beaghey dou: Va mee paagh, as cha dug shiu jough dou.
Va mee my yoarree, as cha ghow shiu stiagh mee: rooisht, as cha ren shiu my choamrey: ching as ayns pryssoon, as cha daink shiu dy my yeaghyn.
Eisht nee adsyn myrgeddyn e y reggyrt, gra, Hiarn, cooin honnick shin oo accryssagh, ny paagh, ny dty yoarree, ny rooisht, ny ching, ny ayns pryssoon, as nagh chooin shin liat.
Eisht nee e nyn vreggyrt ad, gra, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, ayns wheesh as nagh ren shiu eh son annane jeh’n vooinjer sloo jeu shoh, cha ren shiu eh er my hons.
As hed ad shoh ersooyl gys y kerraghey dy bragh farraghtyn; agh y chloan chairagh gys y vea veayn.
AS haink eh gy kione, tra va Yeesey erreish ooilley ny goan shoh y loart, dy doort e roosyn va sheer geyrt er,
Ta fys eu lurg daa laa dy vel fealley ny caisht dy ve ayn, as dy vel yn mac dooinney er ny vrah dy ve er ny chrossey.
Eisht va ny ard‐saggyrtyn as ny scruderyn as shanster yn pobble er nyn jaglym cooidjagh gys thie yn ard‐saggyrt va enmyssit Caiaphas,
As hug ad nyn goyrle dy cheilley, my‐chione Yeesey y ghoall gy follit, as y choyrt e gy baase.
Agh doort ad, cha nee er laa yn ealley, er aggle dy bee irree magh ayn mastey yn pobble.
¶ Nish tra va Yeesey ays Bethany ayns thie Simon yn lourane.
Haink huggey ben as box alabaster dy ooill feer deyr eck, as gheyrt ee eh er e chione echey, myr ve ny hoie ec bee.
Agh tra honnick y vooinjer va sheer geyrt er shoh, vad jymmosagh, gra, cre’n‐fa va yn jummal shoh jeant?
Son oddagh yn ooill shoh v’er ny ve creckit son moarane, as er ny choyrt da ny boughtyn.
Tra hoig Yeesey shoh, doort e roo, kys dy vel shiu boirey yn ven? son thiee er nobbragh obber vie orryms.
Son ta ny boughtyn eu kinjagh meriu, agh mish cha vel eu kinjagh.
Son liorish dy vel ee er gheartey yn ooill shoh er my chorp, thiee er nianoo eh gouyr my oanluckey.
Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, raad erbee dy bee yn sushtal shoh er ny phreacheil ayns ooilley’n teihll, bee shoh myrgeddyn ta’n ven shoh er ny yianoo, er ny insh; son cooinaghtyn jee.
¶ Eishtagh hie fer jeh’n daa ostyl yeig, va enmyssit Yuase Iscariot, gys ny ard saggyrtyn.
As doort e roo, Cre ver shiu doos, as livreym e hiu? As ren ad coonaant rish son jeih peeshyn as feed dy argid.
As veih’n tra shen ve shirrey caa dy vrah eh.
¶ Nish er y chied laa jeh fealley yn arran millish, haink y vooinjer va sheer geyrt er Yeesey huggey, as doort ad rish, Cre’n raad sailt shin dy yanoo aarloo er dy hon dy ee yn Eayn caisht?
As doort e, Gow‐jee gys yn ard‐valley gys leid y dooinney shen, as abber‐jee rish, Ta’n maishter gra, Ta my earishys ec laue, freillym y chaisht ec dty hie’s marish y vooinjer ta sheer geyrt orrym.
As ren adsyn myr va Yeesey er noardaghey daue, as daarlee ad yn Eayn caisht.
Nish tra va’n fastyr er‐jeet, hoie e sheese marish yn daa ostyl yeig.
As myr va’d gee, doort e, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra riu, dy jean annane eauish mish y vrah.
As va’d feer trimshagh, as ren ad toshiaght dy chooilley annane oc dy ghra rish, Hiarn, nee orryms tow cheet?
As dansoor eshyn, gra, Eshyn ta thummey e laue mârym ayns y chlare, e shen nee mee y vrah.
Ta’n mac dooinney goll, myr te scruit jeh: agh smerrick da’n dooinney shen liorish vees yn mac dooinney er ny vrah: veagh eh er ny ve mie son y dooinney shen, mannagh beagh e er‐jeet er y teihll.
Eisht dansoor Yuase ren y vrah e, as doort e, Vaishter nee mish e? Doort eshyn rish, Tow er ghra eh.
¶ As myr vad gee, ghow Yeesey arran, as vannee e as vrish e eh, as hug e eh da ny hostyllyn, gra, Gow‐jee, ee‐jee, shoh my chorps.
As ghow e yn cappan, as hug e booise, as hug e eh daue, gra, Iv‐jee ooilley jeh shoh.
Son shoh my uill’s jeh’n chymney noa, te’r ny gheartey son ymmodee son leih peccaghyn.
Agh ta mee gra riu, Nagh niv‐ym maghey shoh jeh mess y villey feeney, derrey’n laa ivym eh as yn noa mêriu ayns reeriaght my Ayrey.
As tra va’d er ghoall arrane spyrrydoil, hie ad magh gys cronck ny Olivyn.
Eishtagh doort Yeesey roo, Failee yn credjue eauish ooilley noght kyndagh ryms: son te scruit, Bwoaillym’s yn bochilley, as bee kirree yn chioltane er nyn skeylley.
Agh erreish dou ve’r nirree reesht, hem reue gys Galilee.
Dansoor Peddyr as doort e rish, Ga dy vail credjue dy chooilley ghooinney kyndagh rhyts, cha vail my chredjue’s dy bragh.
Doort Yeesey rish, Dy firrinagh ta mee gra rhyt, yn uy noght, roish my ger yn kellagh, dy nob uss mish three keartyn.
Doort Peddyr rish, Dy beïn dy gholl gy baase mârt, cha nobbin oo. As er yn aght keddyn loar ooilley ny ostyllyn.
¶ Eishtagh haink Yeesey mâroo gys ynnyd va enmyssit Gethsemane, as doort e rish ny ostyllyn, Soie‐jee shiuish ayns shoh, choud as hems gys padjer ayns shid.
As ghow e marish Peddyr as daa vac Zebedee, as ren e toshiaght dy ve trimshagh as trome‐chreeagh.
Eisht doort e roo, Ta my annym feer trimshagh, dy jarroo gys y baase; fuirree‐jee ayns shoh as jean‐jee watchal mârym.
As hie e red beg sodjey, as huit e sheese er e eddin, as ghow e padjer as doort e, O my Ayr, my te possible, lig da’n cappan shoh goll shaghym: ny yei cha nee m’aigneys, agh dt’aigneys dy row jeant.
As haink e gys ny ostyllyn, as hooar e ad nyn gadley, as doort e rish Peddyr, kys ta shoh, nagh row shiu able watchal mârym yn oor?
Bee‐jee er nyn dwoai as guee‐jee, nagh duit shiu ayns miolaghey: Tan spyrryd eu dy jarroo arryltagh, agh t’an eihl annoon.
Hie e roish reesht yn nah cheart, as ghow e padjer, gra, O my Ayr, mannagh vod y cappan shoh goll shaghym, fegooish mee dy iv eh, dt’aigneys dy row jeant.
As haink e as hooar e ad nyn gadley reesht, son va ny sooyllyn oc trome.
As daag e ad, as hie e roish reesht, as ghow e padjer yn tress cheart gra ny goan keddyn.
Eishtagh haink e gys e ostyllyn, as doort e roo, Caidle‐jee nish as gow‐jee nyn vea; cur‐my-ner ta’n oor tayrn er‐gerrey, as ta’n Mac dooinney er ny vrah gys lauyn peccee.
Ee ree‐jee, lig dooin goll: cur‐my‐ner, te eshyn ergerrey dooin ta dy my vrah.
¶ As choud as ve foast loart, cur‐my‐ner, haink Yuase fer jeh’n daa ostyl yeig, as va sheshaght woar marish lesh cliwnyn as luirg, veih ny ard‐saggyrtyn as shanstyr yn pobble.
Nish hug eshyn ve’r vrah e, cowrey daue, gra, Quoi‐erbee verryms paag da, shen e, cum-jee e dy shicker.
As chelleeragh haink e gys Yeesey, as doort e, Dy vannee dhyt vainshter, as phaag e e.
As doort Yeesey rish, Charrey, cre’n fa t’ow er‐jeet? Eishtagh haink ad as hug ad nyn lauyn er Yeesey, as ghow ad e.
As cur‐my‐ner heen fer jeusyn va marish Yeesey magh e laue, as hayrn e e chliwe, as woail e fer‐mooinjery yn ard saggyrt, as yiare e yn chleash jeh.
Eishtagh doort Yeesey rish, Cur seose dty chliwe reesht ayns e ynnyd; son nee adsyn ooilley ta goall e chliwe, cherraghtyn liorish y chliwe.
Vel uss goal as laue, nagh voddyms nish guee gys my ayr, as yinnagh e chelleeragh hym er‐skyn daa legion jeig dy ainlyn?
Agh kys eisht vees ny scripturyn er nyn gooilleeney, dy nee shoh myr te dy ve?
Ayns yn oor keddyn doort Yeesey rish y pobble, Vel shiu er‐jeet magh myr noi maarlagh, lesh cliwnyn as luirg dy my ghoal? Hoie‐mee meriu gagh laa gynsaghey ayns y chiamble, as cha ren shiu my ghoall.
Agh va ooilley shoh jeant, dy voddagh scripturyn ny phaderyn ve cooilleenit. Eishtagh ren ooilley ny ostyllyn e y hreggeil as cosney rowe.
¶ As leeid y vooinjer ve’r ghoall Yeesey e ersooyl gys Caiaphas yn ard saggyrt, raad va ny scruderyn as y chanstyr er nyn jaglym cooidjagh.
Agh deiyr Peddyr er foddey ny yei, gys thie yn ard saggyrt, as hie e stiagh, as hoie e marish ny shiarvaantyn dy yeaghyn cre veagh y jerrey.
Nish va ny ard saggyrtyn as y chanstyr as ooilley’n choonceil shirrey fenish foalsey noi Yeesey dy choyrt e gy baase.
Agh cha dooar ad veg: ga dy daink ymmodee fenishyn foalsey, foast cha dooar ad veg. Ec y jerrey haink daa enish foalsey,
As doort ad, Te shoh er ghra, Ta mish able chiamble Yee y lieggal, as y hroggal eh reesht ayns three laa.
As dirree yn ard saggyrt seose, as doort e rish, Nagh vel oo cur ansoor? Cre ta’d shoh dy hoils haghey dtoi?
Agh chum Yeesey e hengey. As dreggyr yn ard saggyrt as doort e rish, Ta mee cur currym ort liorish yn Jee bio, oo dy insh dooin, nee oo yn Creest Mac Yee.
Doort Yeesey rish, Tow uss er ghra eh ny yei ta mish gra riu, Ny lurg shoh hee shiu yn Mac dooinney ny hoie er laue yesh yn phooar, as cheet ayns bodjallyn yn aer.
Eishtagh raip yn ard saggyrt e eaddagh, gra, Te er loart goan mollaghtagh, cre’n feme sodjey t’ain er fenishyn? cur‐my‐ner nish ta shiu er chlashtyn e ghoan mollaghtagh.
Cre ta shiu dy smooinaghtyn? Dansoor ad as doort ad, Te toilchin dy ve er ny choyrt gy baase.
Eisht chew ad shellaghyn ayns e eddin, as woail ad e, as woail feallagh elley e lesh bassyn nyn lauyn.
Gra, Jean phaderys dooin uss y Chreest, quoi e ta dy dty woalley?
¶ Nish va Peddyr ny hoie cheumoie jeh’n cheshaght ayns y hall; as haink ben‐aeg huggey, gra, Vow uss myrgeddyn marish Yeesey dy Ghalilee.
Agh dob e kiongoyrt roo ooilley, gra, Cha s’aym cre t’ow dy ghra.
As tra ve er gholl magh ayns y phoreh, honnick ben‐aeg elley e, as doort ee roosyn vayns shen, Ve shoh myrgeddyn marish Yeesey dy Nazareth.
As reeshtagh dob e lesh loo, Cha nione dou yn dooinney.
As tammylt ny lurg shen haink huggey yn vooinjer va nyn shassoo liorish, as doort ad rish Peddyr, Shicker, she fer jeu oo, son ta dty ghlare dy dty vrah.
Eisht ren e toshiaght dy ghweeaghyn as dy loo, gra, Cha nione dou yn dooinney. As chelleeragh gher yn keillagh.
As chooinee Peddyr er ny goan va Yeesey er ghra rish, Roish my gher y kelliagh, obbee uss mish three cheartyn. As hie e magh as che ayn e dy sharroo.
TRA van moghrey er‐jeet, hug ooilley ny ard saggyrtyn as shanstyr yn pobble nyn goyrle dy cheilley, dy choyrt e gy baase.
As erreish daue ve’r chiangley e, leeid ad e ersooyl, as livrey ad e gys Pontius Pilate yn kianoort.
¶ Tra honnick eisht, Yuase ren y vrah e, dy row e er ny gheyrey, ghow e arrys, as hug e lesh reesht ny jeih peeshyn as feed dy argid gys ny ard saggyrtyn as y chanstyr,
Gra, Ta mee er nianoo peccah, ayns dy vel mee er vrah yn uill niau‐chyndagh. As doort adsyn, Cra ta shen dooinyn? jeagh uss da shen.
As hilg e sheese ny peeshyn argid ayns y chiamble as jimmee e roish, as hie e as ren e e hene y chroghey.
As ghow ny ard saggyrtyn ny peeshyn argid as doort ad, Cha vel lowal dy choyrt ad mastey tashtaghyn y chiamble, er‐yn‐oyr dy nee leagh folley eh.
As ghow ad coyrle, as chionnee ad lieu magher fer ny craie, dy oanluckey joarreeyn ayn.
Shen‐y‐fa va’n magher shen enmyssit magher folley gys y laa t’ayn jiu.
(Shen y tra va cooilleenit ny va loarit liorish Jeremy yn phadeyr, gra, As ghow ad ny jeih peeshyn as feed dy argid, yn phrice echyssyn v’er ny phriceil, e ren adsyn jeh cloan Israel y phriceil.
As hug ad ad son magher fer ny craie, myr va’n Chiarn er no’ardaghey doos.)
As hass Yeesey kiongoyrt rish y kianoort, as denee yn kianoort jeh, gra, Nee uss ree ny Hewnyn? As doort Yeesey rish, Tow uss dy ghra eh.
As tra ve er ny chassid liorish ny ard saggyrtyn as y chanstyr, cha dug e ansoor erbee daue.
Eishtagh doort Pilate rish, Nagh vel oo clashtyn, cre wheelleen red ta’d shoh dy hoilshaghey dtoi?
As cha dug e yn ockle dy ansoor da, ayns wheesh as dy ghow yn kiannoort yyndyss moar.
Nish ec yn ealley shen van kiannoort cliaghtey feysley daue pryssoonagh erbee dy bailloo.
As va oc ec y tra shen ard phryssoonagh va enmyssit Barabbas.
Shen‐y‐fa tra va’d er nyn jaglym cooidjagh, doort Pilate roo, Quoi sailliu mee dy eysley diu? Barabbas, ny Yeesey ta enmyssit Creest?
Son va fyss echey dy nee ayns goanlys va’d er ny livrey seose e.

Tra ve erreish soie sheese er stoyl y vriwnys, hug e ven fys huggey, gra, Ny bee veg ayds dy yanoo rish y dooinney cairagh shen: son ta mish er hurranse ymmodee dy reddyn jiu ayns my chadley kyndagh rish.
Agh choyrlee ny ard saggyrtyn as y chanstyr yn pobble ad dy yanoo aghin son Barabbas, as Yeesey y choyrt gy baase.
Dansoor y kiannoort as doort e roo, Quoi jeh’n jees sailliu mee dy eysley diu? Doort adsyn Barabbas.
Doort Pilate roo, Cre neem eishtagh rish Yeesey ta enmyssit Creest? Doort ad ooilley rish, lig da ve’r ny chrossey?
As doort y kiannoort, Cre’n oyr, cre te er nianoo dy holk? Agh deie adsyn ny smoo, gra, Lig da ver ny chrossey.

¶ Tra honnick Pilate nagh row geill er ny chur da, agh dy row ad aarloo dy irree magh, ghow e ushtey, as nee e e lauyn kiangoyrt rish y pobble, gra, Ta mish niau‐chyndagh jeh fuill yn persoon cairagh shen, jeagh‐jee shiuish da.
Eishtagh dansoor ooilley ’n pobble, gra, Yn uill echey dy row orrinyn, as er nyn gloan.
¶ Eisht deysle e Barabbas daue; as tra ve er chustey Yeesey, livrey e e, dy ve er ny chrossey.
Eisht hug sidooryn y chiannoort lieu Yeesey gys hall y vriwnys, as deie ad er y slane sheshaght jeh ny sidooryn.
As rooisht ad e as hug ad er coamrey dy ghorrym‐jarg.
¶ As tra va’d er fee crown dy ghrinyn hug ad eh er y chione echey, as cuirtlagh ayns y laue yesh echey: as chroym ad nyn ghlioonyn kiongoyrt rish, as chraid ad mish, gra, Dy vannee Ree ny Hewnyn.
As chew ad shellaghyn er, as ghow ad y chuirtliagh, as woail ad eh er y chione.
As erreish daue v’er chraidey mish, ghow ad yn coymrey ree‐oil jeh, as hug ad e gharmad hene er, as leeid ad e ersooyl dy chrossey e.
As myr haink ad magh, hooar ad dooinney jeh Cyrene, va enmyssit Simon; eshyn ren ad y eaginaghey dy ymmyrkey e chrosh.
As tra vad erjeet gys ynnyd ta enmyssit Golgotha, ta shen dy ghra, ynnyd bollag,
¶ Hug ad da vinegar dy iv, as gall ny‐chione; as tra ve er vlashtyn eh, cha ballish giv.
As ren ad e y chrossey, as reyn ad e gharmaddyn, tilgey lottyn; dy voddagh shen ve cooilleenit va loarit liorish y phadeyr, Reyn ad my gharmaddyn nyn mast oc, as er my chooat ren ad lottyn y hilgey.
As hoie ad sheese as watch ad e ayns shen.
As hoie ad harrish e chione yn vriwnys echey scruit, SHOH YEESEY REE NY HEWNYN.
Eisht va daa vaarlagh er ny chrossey marish; yn derrey yeh er y laue yesh, as y jeh elley er y laue chiare.
¶ As chraid y vooinjer va goll shiaghey mish, cra nyn ging,
As gra, Uss ta lieggal y chiamble, as dy hroggal eh reesht ayns tree laa, saue oo hene; my she Mac Yee oo, tar neose jeh’n chrosh.
Myr shen myrgeddyn ren ny ard saggyrtyn craidey mish, marish ny scruderyn as y chanstyr, as doort ad,
Haue e feallagh elley, e hene cha vod e hauail: my she ree Israel e; lig da cheet neose jeh’n chrosh, as nee mad credjal ayn.
Hreisht e ayns Jee; lig da e y livrey nish my sallish e: son doort e, She Mac Yee mee.
Hilg ny maarlee myrgeddyn ve’r nyn grossey marish yn leid keddyn er.
Nish veih yn cheyoo oor, va dorraghys harrish ooilley’n cheer, gys yn nuy oo oor.
As mygeart yn nuyoo oor, deie Yeesey lesh ard choraa, gra, Eli, Eli, lama sabacthani? ta shen dy ghra, My Yee, My Yee, cre’n fa ’tow er my hreggeil?
Doort part jeusyn va nyn shassoo ayns shen, tra cheayll ad shen, T’an dooinney shoh gemagh er Elias.
As chelleeragh roih fer jeu as ghow e spunge, as leen e eh lesh vinegar, as hug e eh er cuirtlagh, as heen e eh huggey dy iv.
Doort y vooinjer elley, Faag‐jee eh, hee mad jig Elias dy hauail e.
¶ Tra va Yeesey er nemagh reesht lesh ard choraa, phaart e.
As cur‐my‐ner, va’n coodaghey va eddyr y chiamble as yn ynnyd casherick rapit veih my chielley, veih’n vullagh gys y laare, as ren y talloo cra, as ny creggyn scoltey.
As va ny oaiaghyn er nyn vosley, as ren ymmodee jeh kirp ny nooghyn va nyn gadley, girree seose,
As cheet ass ny hoaiaghyn oc, lurg yn irree seose reesht echey, as gollstiagh ayns yn ardvalley casherick, as ad hene y hoilshaghey da ymmodee.
Nish tra honnick yn captain‐keead as adsyn va marish watchal Yeesey, yn cra tallooin as ny reddyn v’er jeet gy kione, ghow ad aggle moar, gra, Dy firrinagh shoh va Mac Yee.
As va ymmodee mrane ayns shen va dy akin e foddey vow, va er neiyrt er Yeesey veih Galilee as er hirveish er.
Nyn mast oc va Moirrey Malaine, as Moirrey moir James as Joses, as moir cloan Zebedee.
Tra va’n fastyr erjeet, haink dooinney berchiagh jeh Arimathea va enmyssit Joseph, va myrgeddyn e hene er chredjal ayns Yeesey.
Hie e shoh gys Pilate, as ren e aghin son corp Yeesey; eishtagh hug Pilate sarey yn corp dy ve er ny livrey.
As tra va Joseph er ghoall yn corp, hoil e eh ayns aanrit glen,
As doanluck e eh ayns yn oaie noa echey hene, ve er ny chley ayns creg, as roull e clough woar er beeal yn oaie, as jimmee e roish.
As va Moirrey Malaine, as Moirrey elley, nyn soie jeeragh er yn oaie.
¶ Nish yn nah laa lurg laa yn aarlaghey, haink ny ard saggyrtyn as ny Phariseeyn cooidjagh gys Pilate,
Gra, Vainshter, ta cooinaghtyn ain dy doort yn moaltere shen, choud as ve foast bio, Lurg three laa neems girree reesht.

Cur sarey er‐y‐fa shen yn oaie dy ve jeant shicker, derrey yn tress laa, er aggle dy jig yn vooinjer te’r ve sheer geiyrt er, ayns yn uy, as dy geid ad e ersooyl, as dy jir ad rish yn pobble, Te er nirree veih ny merriu; myr shen bee yn oill stierree ny smessey ny’n chied oill.
Doort Pilate roo, Ta watch eu, immee‐jee reue, jean‐jee cha shicker jeh as oddys shiu.
Myr shen hie ad as ren ad yn oaie shicker, sealal y clogh as soiaghey watch.
TRA va’n doonaght ec kione as y laa toshiaght soilshaghey er y chied laa jeh’n chaghtin, haink Moirrey Malaine, as Moirrey elley, dy voddagh ad yn oaie y akin.
As cur‐my‐ner, va cra‐tallooin moyr ayn; son va ainle y Chiarn erjeet neose veih niau, as er‐jeet as er rowlal back y chlagh jeh beeal yn oaie, as er hoie er.
Va’n eddin echey goll rish y tendeil as y coamrey giall myr y sniaghtey.
As ayns aggle roish, ren y vooinjer va watchal cra, as haink ad dy ve myr deney marroo.
As dreggyr yn ainle, as doort e rish ny mrane; Ny gow‐jee aggle; son ta fys aym dy vel shiu shirrey Yeesey ve’r ny chrossey.
Cha vel e ayns shoh; son te er nirree, myr doort e hene, tar‐jee, jeah‐jee er yn ynnyd raad va’n Chiarn oanluckit.
As immee‐jee dy tappee, as insh‐jee dauesyn va sheer geyrt er, dy vel e er nireee veih ny merriu; as cur‐my‐ner te goll reue gys Galilee, ayns shen hee shiu e, cur‐my‐ner ta mish er ninsh diu.
As jimmee ad dy tappee veih’n oaie lesh aggle as boggey moar, as roih ad, dy chur lieu yn naight gys e ostyllyn.
¶ As myr va’d goll-dy insh eh da e ostyllyn, cur‐my‐ner haink Yeesey nyn guail, gra, Dy vannee diu, as haink ad, as chum ad e er y chassyn as hug ad ooashley da.
Eishtagh doort Yeesey roo, Ny gowjee aggle, immee‐jee as abber‐jee rish my vraaraghyn ad dy gholl gys Galilee, as ayns shen hee ad mee.
¶ Nish tra vad goll, cur‐my‐ner, haink part jeh’n watch gys yn ard‐valley, as hoilshee ad da ny ard saggyrtyn ooilley ny reddyn v’er jeet gy kione.
As tra var adsyn as y chanstyr er nyn jiaglym cooidjagh, as er chur nyn goyrle dy cheilley, hug ad sim moar dy argid da ny sidooryn,
Gra, abber‐jee shiuish, Haink e ostyllyn ayns yn ny, as gheid ad e er‐sooyl choud as va shin nyn gadley.
As my chlinnys y kiannoort jeh, ver mainyn er credjal dy vel eh firrinagh as freillee mad shiuish sauchey.
Myr shen ghow ad yn argid, as ren ad myr ve’r ny chur rowe, as ta’n raa shoh dy cadjin er ny insh magh mastey ny Hewnyn gys y laa t’ayn jiu.
Eisht hie yn yn ostyl yeig rowe; gys Galilee, gys sleiau raad va Yeesey er noardaghey daue.
As tra honnick ad e, hug ad ooashley da; agh va part imneagh ayns nyn gredjue.
As haink Yeesey, as loar e roo, gra, Ta dy chooilley phooar er ny chur dou ayns niau as er y talloo.
¶ Immee‐jee er‐y‐fa as ynsee‐jee dy chooilley ashoon as bashtee‐jee ad ayns ennym yn Ayr, as y Vac, as y spyrryd Noo:
Gynsaghey daue dy realley dy chooilley nee cre‐erbee ta mish er chur ayns sarey diu; as cur‐my‐ner, Ta mish meriu kinjagh gys eer jerrey’n teihll. Amen.
